name: Speech to Text for WPForms
author: Boite0

sections.description:
Speech to Text for WPForms revolutionizes form filling by enabling users to input text into WPForms forms using their voice. This plugin leverages the cutting-edge Whisper voice recognition technology and OpenAI’s ChatGPT for efficient and accurate speech-to-text conversion.

Key Features:
– Utilizes OpenAI’s Whisper and ChatGPT for state-of-the-art voice recognition and text conversion.
– Automatically populates text fields in WPForms with speech.
– Prioritizes user privacy with a strict no data retention policy.

For more information and our terms of service, please visit Terms of Service for Speech to Text for WPForms.

Usage

Simply click the start recording button next to a form field, speak into your microphone, and watch as your words are converted to text and filled into the form.

External Services

This plugin integrates with external services, including OpenAI’s Whisper for voice recognition and ChatGPT for text conversion. No personal data or voice recordings are stored by our plugin. All data processing occurs in real-time, ensuring privacy and security.

For detailed information on our data handling practices:
– OpenAI Privacy Policy
– OpenAI Terms of Use
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin from the WordPress Plugin Directory.
  2. In your WordPress admin area, navigate to Plugins > Add New and upload the plugin’s ZIP file.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Ensure WPForms is installed and activated.
  5. Voice recording buttons will automatically appear next to WPForms form fields.
sections.faq:
How does Speech to Text for WPForms work?

The plugin captures your voice as you speak into the microphone, sends the audio to OpenAI’s Whisper for transcription, and then fills the transcribed text into the form field.

Is my data secure?

Yes, we prioritize your privacy and security. The plugin does not store any voice or text data, processing everything in real-time. For more details, visit our Terms of Service.

What types of fields can I fill using my voice?

Currently, the plugin supports text fields, with plans to expand to other field types in future updates.
